mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lasteyrie, C. de 1759-1849
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Received his letter of March 1808; sends him book on cotton growing; sent one to Philosophical Society which made him a member; admires Jefferson for agricultural projects; cannot do same in France; a French missionary to Chinese wrote anecdote on agricultural societies; talk but do nothing; hopes Jefferson will write him on subject; saw Lafayette.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lafayette, Marie Joseph Paul Yves Roch Gilbert Du Motier, marquis de, 1757-1834
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1808 March 28, Paris, [France] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
